import blogPic from '../pages/img/blog.jpg'; import icon from '../pages/img/icon.jpg'; import { useState } from 'react'; // Sample blog data const sampleBlog = { title: 'Sample Blog Title', author: 'Sample Author', date: 'Sample Date', description: 'Sample Description', content: 'Sample Content' }; const Blog = () => { const [blog, setBlog] = useState(sampleBlog); // Replace with actual data fetching return (

{blog.title}

Published by: {blog.author} {blog.date}

{blog.description}

{blog.content}

Comment Section

0

DISPLAY COMMENTS HERE

) } export default Blog;
